Class AudioLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mathiewz.openal.AudioLoader

  • public class AudioLoader
extends Object
    A utility to provide a simple and rational interface to the slick internals
    Author:
    kevin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Audio getAudio(String format, InputStream in)
      Get audio data in a playable state by loading the complete audio into memory.
      static Audio getStreamingAudio(String format, URL url)
      Get audio data in a playable state by setting up a stream that can be piped into OpenAL - i.e. streaming audio
      static void update()
      Allow the streaming system to update itself

    • Method Detail

      • getAudio

        public static Audio getAudio(String format,
                             InputStream in)
                      throws IOException
        Get audio data in a playable state by loading the complete audio into memory.
        Parameters:
        format - The format of the audio to be loaded (something like "XM" or "OGG")
        in - The input stream from which to load the audio data
        Returns:
        An object representing the audio data
        Throws:
        IOException - Indicates a failure to access the audio data

      • getStreamingAudio

        public static Audio getStreamingAudio(String format,
                                      URL url)
                               throws IOException
        Get audio data in a playable state by setting up a stream that can be piped into OpenAL - i.e. streaming audio
        Parameters:
        format - The format of the audio to be loaded (something like "XM" or "OGG")
        url - The location of the data that should be streamed
        Returns:
        An object representing the audio data
        Throws:
        IOException - Indicates a failure to access the audio data

      • update

        public static void update()
        Allow the streaming system to update itself
